name: GetAllocationRecord
description:
Fetch the complete allocation record for a given ID.

This tool provides detailed information about an allocation using its unique ID. It should be called when you need to access specific allocation data from Asana.

parameters.name: allocation_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the allocation to fetch the complete record.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the allocation.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of optional properties to include in the response, as some properties are excluded by default.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true to receive the response in a pretty, readable format. Useful for debugging, but increases response size and time.
